I‚Äôm Shashank Rao ‚Äî welcome to my digital garden üå±

 
	 
		About Me
		Work Experience
		Projects
		Collaborate?
	 
 

About Me
I‚Äôm a Year 2 Undergraduate genetics student at King‚Äôs College London, passionate about biology, programming, and bits of social contract theory.
I love combining disciplines, whether it‚Äôs using code to explore genetics or using philosophy to understand society.
Outside the lab and code editor, I play the guitar, write fantasy stories, and occasionally attempt to draw things that don‚Äôt look awful. I hope you enjoy exploring my projects, and ideas!
Work Experience


üß¨ British Society for Research on Ageing + University of Exeter (ongoing)

As part of the BSRA Summer Studentship Grant I was awarded, I undertook a research project under Professor Anna Murray (Professor of Human Genetics and Director of Research and Impact) at the University of Exeter to look at the effects of menopausal symptoms on postmenopausal health using Mendelian Randomisation and the UKBioBank Database‚Ä¶ Read More
#UKBioBank GWAS MendelianRandomisation Bioinformatics BSRA internship



üß´ Reproductive Genomics Team, University of Exeter (6 weeks)

Summer intern in a GWAS-focused lab, working on bioinformatics tools and variant data visualisation.



üß† Rudgwick Medical Centre (2 months)

Worked as part of a team focussed on finetuning the WhisperAI model by OpenAI towards transcribing consultations. This experience allowed me to explore the cutting edge of AI finetuning at the height of the AI boom, while simultaneously working towards a product with real societal impact.
#AI Medical Finetuning WhisperAI



Projects


GWASExplorer.com

A free, browser-based web tool to visualise GWAS summary statistics:
Zero code required
Flexible formatting support
Automated allele frequency querying (via GNOMAD)
Integrated with GeneCards
All processing in-browser ‚Äî no data is uploaded
‚ö†Ô∏è Not affiliated with the GWAS Explorer by the NCI



Think Pythonically

Learn Python the better way.
Focus on how to think like Python
Avoid rote syntax memorisation
Free and beginner-friendly
Still being improved ‚Äî feedback welcome!



Ideate2D

Make games in Python ‚Äî visually and intuitively.
Ideate2D is a WYSIWYG 2D game engine built on PyGame:
Drag-and-drop scene editor
Generates Python code you can modify
Good for teaching or tinkering
Aimed at accessibility without sacrificing flexibility



Into the Mind

A work-in-progress book weaving together:

Biology
Social contract theory
History


All to understand how we got here ‚Äî and where we‚Äôre going.



Chirp 

AI Interface that overlays onto screen seamlessly,
Hides and Reappears as you need it.
Uses local LLMs with Ollama, ensuring privacy and convenience




Want to Collaborate?
If you‚Äôre into weird interdisciplinary ideas, or just want to say hi, get in touch ‚Äî or check out my GitHub!

This is work in progress of my description of the research project I undertook at the University of Exeter as part of Professor Anna Murray‚Äôs lab. The project was funded by the BSRA through the BSRA Summer Studentship Grant 2025.
